query:
ALTER TABLE employees 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mobilePhone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emergencyContact VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emergencyPhone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressStreet VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressNumber VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressComplement VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressNeighborhood VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressCity VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressState VARCHAR(2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressZipCode VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressCountry VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Brasil',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rg VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rgIssuer VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rgIssueDate DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctps VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctpsSeries VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctpsState VARCHAR(2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pis VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS maritalStatus ENUM('solteiro', 'casado', 'divorciado', 'viuvo', 'uniao_estavel'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS gender ENUM('masculino', 'feminino', 'outro', 'nao_informar'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nationality VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Brasileira',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationLevel ENUM('fundamental_incompleto', 'fundamental_completo', 'medio_incompleto', 'medio_completo', 'superior_incompleto', 'superior_completo', 'pos_graduacao', 'mestrado', 'doutorado'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationInstitution VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationCourse VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationCompletionYear INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS contractType ENUM('clt', 'pj', 'estagio', 'temporario', 'terceirizado') DEFAULT 'clt',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS workSchedule VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS weeklyHours INT DEFAULT 40,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS terminationDate DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS terminationReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankName VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankCode VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankBranch VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankAccount VARCHAR(30),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankAccountType ENUM('corrente', 'poupanca', 'salario'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pixKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasHealthInsurance BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasDentalInsurance BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasLifeInsurance BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasMealVoucher BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasTransportVoucher BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasGymMembership BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS benefitsNotes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentRgUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentCpfUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentCtpsUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentProofOfAddressUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentDiplomaUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentOthersUrl TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS internalNotes TEXT
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute ALTER TABLE employees 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS mobilePhone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emergencyContact VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emergencyPhone VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressStreet VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressNumber VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressComplement VARCHAR(100),

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressState VARCHAR(2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressZipCode VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS addressCountry VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Brasil',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rg VARCHAR(20),

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rgIssueDate DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctps VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctpsSeries VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ctpsState VARCHAR(2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pis VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS maritalStatus ENUM('solteiro', 'casado', 'divorciado', 'viuvo', 'uniao_estavel'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS gender ENUM('masculino', 'feminino', 'outro', 'nao_informar'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nationality VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Brasileira',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationLevel ENUM('fundamental_incompleto', 'fundamental_completo', 'medio_incompleto', 'medio_completo', 'superior_incompleto', 'superior_completo', 'pos_graduacao', 'mestrado', 'doutorado'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationInstitution VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationCourse VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS educationCompletionYear INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS contractType ENUM('clt', 'pj', 'estagio', 'temporario', 'terceirizado') DEFAULT 'clt',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS workSchedule VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS weeklyHours INT DEFAULT 40,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS terminationDate DATETIME,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS terminationReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankName VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankCode VARCHAR(10),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankBranch VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankAccount VARCHAR(30),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS bankAccountType ENUM('corrente', 'poupanca', 'salario'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pixKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasHealthInsurance BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasDentalInsurance BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasLifeInsurance BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasMealVoucher BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasTransportVoucher BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasGymMembership BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS benefitsNotes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentRgUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentCpfUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentCtpsUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentProofOfAddressUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentDiplomaUrl VARCHAR(512),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS documentOthersUrl TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS notes TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS internalNotes TEXT
